sub_topic: Determining the length of a side in an equilateral triangle.
message_1: A triangle has two sides that measure 8 cm each. Calculate the length of the third side, assuming it is also equal in length to the other two sides, according to the properties of an equilateral triangle.
message_2: Since all sides of an equilateral triangle are equal in length, the third side of the triangle will also measure 8 cm.
